metadata.description: How well you exchange ideas and information in a work context

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Mercury shows information exchange style. Saturn adds structure and professionalism. Jupiter brings openness to ideas.

planet_meanings.Mercury: how you exchange information and ideas
planet_meanings.Jupiter: openness to new ideas and big-picture thinking

very_low.label: Blocked
very_low.guidance: Professional communication strained; use email and documentation.

low.label: Formal
low.guidance: Keep it professional and structured; small talk may fall flat.

mid.label: Professional
mid.guidance: Standard work communication; neither great nor problematic.

high.label: Productive
high.guidance: Ideas flow well in meetings; good brainstorming partner.

very_high.label: In Sync
very_high.guidance: Excellent professional rapport; anticipate each other's thinking.
